Embed player overrides error info: In order to use the Podverse embed web player with custom overrides, we first need to add a list of "approved media urls" for this podcast. We require this to prevent people from using our embed player to pirate or misrepresent podcasts. Please contact us and we will enable this feature for you!
Embed player overrides error email body: Please provide us with a link to the RSS feed for your podcast so we can enable the embed player overrides feature for you.
Embed player overrides error email subje: Help with setting approved media urls for the embed player overrides feature
Embed custom CSS intro instructions: Override the style of the embedded Podverse player with a script on your website.
Embed custom CSS instructions: Insert some JavaScript to override the style of the embeddable player. Copy the script below, change it if you want, then paste it into (the bottom of) your website.
Embed episode only instructions: Embed a single episode by pressing the "Share" icon icon on Podverse, copying the "Embed" code, and pasting it into your webpage.
Embed podcast with episodes instructions: Include an episode list with the embedded player by pressing the "Share" icon on Podverse, copying the "Embed" code, and pasting it into your webpage.
Export OPML Description: Export your subscriptions as an OPML file to import them in other podcast apps.

License and free trial info: All Podverse software is provided under a free and open source (FOSS) licence. Features that require updating our servers are available only with a Premium membership. Sign up today and get a 3 month free trial.

pages-about_Description: Podcasting 2.0 certified player for Android, F-Droid, iOS, and the web. Share created clips, highlights, playlists, and chapters, sync your queue and history to all devices, and create backups with Podverse Premium. Value-for-value (V4V) funding. Not only Open Source, but also copylefted libre software. Explore the Podcast Index with popularity, profiles, and transcripts.
pages-embed-player-demo_Description: A demo of the embeddable Podverse player.
pages-embed-player-demo-custom-css_Descr: A demo of the embeddable Podverse player.

pages-v4vWallet_Description: A browser extension that lets you send Bitcoin to content creators on any value-for-value website.
